lead_paragraph: The report from the New York attorney general portrays a complex business in which technologically adept ticket brokers are able to profit at the expense of ordinary fans.

headline.print_headline: Widespread Abuses Reported at New York’s Ticket Brokers
headline.main: Report Exposes Widespread Abuses in Ticketing Industry in New York

snippet: The report from the New York attorney general portrays a complex business in which technologically adept ticket brokers are able to profit at the expense of ordinary fans.
abstract: New York Atty Gen Eric T Schneiderman releases findings of three-year investigation into online ticketing market, which paint picture of complex business that he says requires further investigation and is in need of crackdown; much of report focuses on computer programs that automatically buy up large numbers of tickets for resale.
